lead_paragraph: NBC's coverage of the Rio Olympics on Sunday included controversy over a commentator comment and some harrowing video of the treacherous cycling road race. A look at the Rio Olympics through a media lens:

headline.print_headline: Olympic Viewing: A Commentator's Regret, More Ratings Blues
headline.main: Olympic Viewing: A Commentator's Regret, More Ratings Blues
